articles.description: A bell ringer in the Las Vegas valley received a surprise recently. Someone anonymously dropped a Canadian Gold Maple Leaf coin into a red kettle this week, according to The Salvation Army. The coin, weighing at one ounce, is believed to be worth between $1,8…

articles.title: Explained: A massive cyberattack in US, using a novel set of tools - The Indian Express
articles.description: One of the biggest cyberattacks to have targeted US government agencies and private companies, the 'SolarWinds hack' is being seen as a likely global effort. How was it carried out, and what kind of data has been compromised? Why have US government officials …
articles.content:
